author: Courtland Milloy
title: The cure for racial disparities in health care is known. It’s the willingness to fix it that’s lagging. - The Washington Post
description: The cure for racial disparities in health care is known. It’s the willingness to fix it that’s lagging.  The Washington Post
content:
Disturbing indeed.
In Maryland, black people make up 31 percent of the population but 52 percent of the deaths from covid-19. Similar disparities are also showing up in places such as Detroit, New Orleans and Milwaukee and parts of North Carolina and Mississ… [+5693 chars]
